title: Scraping residue out of plastic straw to smoke. Do or don't?
body: ConfidentInterest618. • 3 yr. ago. No. NucIearChrist. •. Yes you can smoke it. Gathering up the residue can be tricky. Try a small drop of water into the straw and shake it back and forth until all the residue has been picked up by the water. Pore it out onto something and let it dry out and scrape it all up.
readable_content:
- zzspecialty (2020-12-08): Scraping residue out of plastic straw to smoke. Do or don't?
  - G_Skeletor: You should absolutely smoke ALL white residue, thats straight meth homie, this is why u use a glass straw so u can just heat the straw and suck the vapor out.
    - CIMDG
  - ConfidentInterest618: No
    - NucIearChrist: Yes you can smoke it. Gathering up the residue can be tricky. Try a small drop of water into the straw and shake it back and forth until all the residue has been picked up by the water. Pore it out onto something and let it dry out and scrape it all up
      - zzspecialty: Oh shoot. I've just been cutting the straw into 1in pieces and scraping it out with a small piece of copper. So far I'm getting a decent amount, in comparison to what I use
